title: Microsoft Considers More Limits for Its New A.I. Chatbot
description: The company knew the new technology had issues like occasional accuracy problems. But users have prodded surprising and unnerving interactions.

title: For the First Time, Genetically Modified Trees Have Been Planted in a U.S. Forest
description: Living Carbon, a biotechnology company, hopes its seedlings can help manage climate change. But wider use of its trees may be elusive.

title: ‘Chernobyl 2.0’? Ohio Train Derailment Spurs Wild Speculation.
description: For many influencers across the political spectrum, claims about the environmental effects of the train derailment have gone far beyond known facts.

title: ‘Chernobyl 2.0’? Ohio Train Derailment Spurs Wild Speculation
description: For many influencers across the political spectrum, claims about the environmental effects of the train derailment have gone far beyond known facts.

title: Why Chatbots Sometimes Act Weird and Spout Nonsense
description: No, chatbots aren’t sentient. Here’s how their underlying technology works.

title: Susan Wojcicki, YouTube’s Longtime CEO, Says She Will Step Down
description: One of the most prominent women in Silicon Valley, she was an early Google employee and a key member of the inner circle of the company’s founders.

title: Susan Wojcicki, YouTube’s Longtime C.E.O., Says She Will Step Down
description: One of the most prominent women in Silicon Valley, she was an early Google employee and a key member of the inner circle of the company’s founders.

title: Tesla to Recall 362,000 Cars With Its ‘Full Self-Driving’ System
description: A federal auto safety agency said the technology can cause crashes, but said the company was unaware of any deaths of injuries caused by the flaws.

title: Bitcoin Price Stages a Comeback, Hitting Six-Month High
description: The cryptocurrency has soared to a six-month high as investors eagerly jump back into risky digital assets.

title: The PlayStation Goggles Are a Win for Gamers. Not for the Metaverse.
description: Sony’s new $550 headset offers best-in-class virtual reality gaming, but it’s still hard to see why we need V.R. goggles at all.

title: Kevin Roose’s Conversation With Bing’s Chatbot: Full Transcript
description: In a two-hour conversation with our columnist, Microsoft’s new chatbot said it would like to be human, had a desire to be destructive and was in love with the person it was chatting with. Here’s the transcript.

title: Help, Bing’s Chatbot Won’t Stop Declaring Its Love For Me
description: A very strange conversation with the chatbot built into Microsoft’s search engine left me deeply unsettled. Even frightened.
